Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/33rd
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Cicero, I-55 and Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Cicero, I-55, then resume their normal route on Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/33rd.

Allow extra travel time.
